name: MakeMyDay
0:
”Alexa, Make My Day”
”Alexa, ask Make My Day for some motivation”
”Alexa, open Make My Day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make my day
des:
Make My Day will get you inspired to make great things, whether you need inspiration for your education, your job or just an ordinary day. Make My Day will bring you that motivation to make the best of every day with inspiring and powerful quotes.
Just say: "Alexa, Make My Day" and Alexa will do just that for you, Make your day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
